data.message: I just got hacked on Facebook by criminals using a friends' messenger account to solicit money because I "won" a Facebook Freedom award of $50K!  The phone number used to text me was (845) 204-3938.  Let's put these criminals in jail!

replies.message: We're sorry to hear that, Corey.  If your account has been taken over by someone else, please secure it here: http://bit.ly/1Sgiffj. You can also find detailed information about the tools and extra security features you can use to help keep your account secure on Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/1Sgiffh. -Abby

Have had several people attempt to persuade me that I have won a Facebook prize, all Facebook ever tells me to do is Block them. But apparently Facebook is TOTALLY UNINTERESTED in doing anything to stop criminals from using "Facebook" as a lure to unsuspecting account holders.
Yeah facebook.. i cant log in my 2nd account fb. and there is requirment i.d??? please tell why?????
